subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After a collision at the plate Saturday in which Tampa Bay’s Elliot Johnson ran over Yankees catcher Francisco Cervelli, Joe Girardi complained about the Rays’ hard play in a spring training game.
snippet: After a collision at the plate Saturday in which Tampa Bay’s Elliot Johnson ran over Yankees catcher Francisco Cervelli, Joe Girardi complained about the Rays’ hard play in a spring training game.
